title: IDA decompiled function signature mismatch
content:
I am on the last version of IDA.

There is a function B, that its signature is B(int a,int b).

There is a function A that calls it. 
But in function A, the call appears like B(12) for example.

How do I make it synchronized / decompile just function A again? 

Thanks.

comments.text: it might be beneficial if you would show us some assembly esp. around the call B

answers_data.content: You can go to function A and press y on the call to B, and edit to int B(int a, int b)
